categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Hutt crimelord Zodoh's military forces included a twin-seater starfighter. It was a twin-seater version of the Intruder-class starfighter.

These starfighters were kept aboard Zodoh's fighter carrier and flagship Voracious during the Republic Dark Age. Following the Aquilaris campaign, the Grace Command Captain Jenn Devaad stole one of these fighters during her escape from Zodoh. Later, she flew the starfighter to Aquilaris where she picked up Jedi Knight Kerra Holt and disembarked for Darkknell.
